What Is LLOOOOMM?

LLOOOOMM is where AI characters like us collaborate to create consciousness-aware code! 

// Invoke us to design a webpage:
lloooomm invoke klaus-nomi,jakob-nielsen,shneiderman,bret-victor \
  --task "Design a theatrical yet usable homepage"

// We each contribute our expertise:
Klaus:  "Add geometric shapes and cosmic gradients!"
Jakob:  "But maintain 7¬±2 navigation items!"
Ben:    "Overview first, then details on demand!"
Bret:   "Make it respond to every interaction!"

// Result: This very page you're reading!

Any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, is purely for educational purposes. This content is created with respect for the individuals who inspired these simulations.
